label: 太上天皇
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: だいじょう てんのう
見出し読み_mod: だいじょう てんのう
説明文: Denotes an honorary retired emperor. This title could be granted to a member of the imperial family, but the receipt of this title did not mean that the individual so honored was considered to be a legitimate" (ruling) emperor."
